thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 38 of 2268
thread.title: Paul G

author: Paul G
title: Paul G
text: Ordering on line couldn't have been easier. Gave exact measurements having received colour samples for roller blind. Arrived within 3 days of ordering with easy fitting guidelines. Fitted exactly into recess and appears to be a very good quality product replacing a more expensive product from a high end department store which required alterations and which had issues with shrinkage and failure of mechanism. Will definitely use Blinds2Go again.
